value.fullName: Code quality check
value.label: Code quality check

value.fullName: Constructive and Destructive changes can be packaged into one commit
value.label: Constructive and Destructive changes can be packaged into one commit

value.fullName: Recurrent metadata check-ins
value.label: Recurrent metadata check-ins

value.fullName: Salesforce users can collaborate on their metadata changes"
value.label: Salesforce users can collaborate on their metadata changes"

value.fullName: Support all conflict resolution types - Ours, Theirs, Recursive and Fast Forward
value.label: Support all conflict resolution types - Ours, Theirs, Recursive and Fast Forward

value.fullName: Validate/Test a user story prior to a push
value.label: Validate/Test a user story prior to a push

value.fullName: Deploy specific work items (with dependencies) to higher environments that have passed testing
value.label: Deploy specific work items (with dependencies) to higher environments that have passed testing

value.fullName: Leverage an existing build to re-deploy into other environments
value.label: Leverage an existing build to re-deploy into other environments

value.fullName: Rollback the package either completely or selectively upon successful deployment
value.label: Rollback the package either completely or selectively upon successful deployment

value.fullName: Delta Deployments for nested metadata components
value.label: Delta Deployments for nested metadata components

value.fullName: Schedule deployments (daily, weekly, webhook-based) with pre/post deployment tasks
value.label: Schedule deployments (daily, weekly, webhook-based) with pre/post deployment tasks

value.fullName: Automate Unit Tests by running code coverage only on dependent Test Classes
value.label: Automate Unit Tests by running code coverage only on dependent Test Classes

value.fullName: Tag work items during deployments
value.label: Tag work items during deployments

value.fullName: Run Pre/Post Destructive Changes during Rollback to avoid dependency errors
value.label: Run Pre/Post Destructive Changes during Rollback to avoid dependency errors

value.fullName: Dependent records across multiple objects can be migrated with no limit on #records
value.label: Dependent records across multiple objects can be migrated with no limit on #records

value.fullName: Sensitive records masked during migration
value.label: Sensitive records masked during migration

value.fullName: Supports Lookup, Master-Detail, Junction objects, Self References
value.label: Supports Lookup, Master-Detail, Junction objects, Self References

value.fullName: Schedule Data Loads or Integrate with metadata deployment
value.label: Schedule Data Loads or Integrate with metadata deployment

value.fullName: Assists with preparation of logical metadata packages with depedencies
value.label: Assists with preparation of logical metadata packages with depedencies

value.fullName: Supports creation of contextual Scratch orgs and Unlocked Packages
value.label: Supports creation of contextual Scratch orgs and Unlocked Packages

value.fullName: Completely driven by GUI
value.label: Completely driven by GUI

value.fullName: Creation of templates to support pre/post deployment activities
value.label: Creation of templates to support pre/post deployment activities

value.fullName: Templates can be run separately or tagged with CI Jobs
value.label: Templates can be run separately or tagged with CI Jobs

value.fullName: Out-of-Box Integrations with commonly used tools like JIRA, GIT, etc.
value.label: Out-of-Box Integrations with commonly used tools like JIRA, GIT, etc.

value.fullName: Help users achieve CD faster than any other release management platform
value.label: Help users achieve CD faster than any other release management platform

value.label: Create feature templates for nCino with dependencies across sObjects

value.label: Record the Metadata Configuration and nCino records in a branch

value.label: Deploy nCino templates (w/ dependencies) from either Salesforce Org or Version Control

value.label: Version and deploy Vlocity datapacks with dependencies to reduce deployment times

value.label: Visualize every day CI/CD operations and be able to generate reports on a daily/weekly/monthly basis

value.fullName: Version unlocked packages and commit the changes to version control
value.label: Version unlocked packages and commit the changes to version control
